Wutan Bath

Control, discipline, flexibility, balance

Contact

We have a mailing list, a Facebook page and a Twitter feed for generally keeping up to date with the club.

If you want to get in contact more directly, either send us a message via Facebook or get in touch directly with the appropriate instructor.

Instructors

David Rutherford

Email: david@bathtaichi.co.uk

Phone: 07970 797 482

David is the chief instructor of Wutan for the Bath area and has been running classes for over 20 years.

Marick Baxter

Email: marickbaxter@hotmail.com

Phone: 07881 646 633

Marick runs Chen-style Tai Chi classes (including Hsing I) and all Kung Fu classes.

Jim Litster

Email: N/A

Phone: 01225 427 461

Jim runs seated Tai Chi classes aimed at folk whose knees and hips aren't up to the standing form.
